segments.text: I was really glad to hear about your award . Congratulations !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Denise . Actually , I was really surprised . I mean , there were a lot of qualified people out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But the work you did was really exceptional ! You definitely deserved it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I expect to see your name nominated pretty soon , too . You â€™ Ve been doing some great work !
segments.speaker: S2
